opinion.case_name: Graves v. Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

opinion:
541 U.S. 1057

GRAVES
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 03-8778.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 17, 2004.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of petitioner to defer consideration of petition for writ of certiorari denied. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 351 F. 3d 143.
